My Work

Project Details

Project Name
Internal Admin Module - (Domain - Finance)
Technologies: .NET Core, MVC, Azure, C#, SQL Server, jQuery, Web API.
 ERP System contains CRM, Finance, Payment Processing, Insurance, Administration and Quote module.
 Currently working on Payment processing using Moneris and Document management module using Azure

Project Name
360 Patientcare - (Domain - Health)
Technologies: Angular, Web API, Azure, Service Bus, Blob Storage, Function App.
 Developed web-based solutions for healthcare sector to connect securely with patients, transfer documents, run campaigns, and consult remotely using call and scheduling features.
 Developed user interface based on authentication and authorization, integrated Zoom API and Azure for business logic layer.
